title: College Leap: Startup helps students navigate transferring
author: Louise Lee
excerpt:
Jay Zhao, BS 21, might just be able to add “life changer for transfer students” to his resume. That’s now a part of his job as a founder of College Leap, where he’s making community college students’ dreams of transferring to four-year colleges come true. College Leap supports community college students, particularly international students, many […]
